Black Panther

This is the Black Panther, he is the first black superhero with superpowers, he's super-smart, a master martial artist and he's rich.

Things about the Black Panther

  • The king of the African nation Wakanda
  • The power to draw upon the knowledge, strength, and every experience of every previous Black Panther
  • Superhuman strength, speed, reflexes, agility, stamina, endurance, durability, and senses
  • Master martial artist, tactician and stratiegist
  • Utilizes vibranium suit and equipment
  • More about the Black Panther

A few of Black Panther's Friends

  • >Black Widow
